message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the double replacement reaction between silver nitrate (AgNO3) and potassium chloride (KCl)?
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the double replacement reaction between silver nitrate (AgNO3) and potassium chloride (KCl) is:

AgNO3(aq) + KCl(aq) â†’ AgCl(s) + KNO3(aq)
